name: The Shadow Over Innsmouth Interactive Story - H.P. Lovecraft
name_original: The Shadow Over Innsmouth Interactive Story - H.P. Lovecraft
description:
This is the 1.0 version of the University student project of creating an interactive Story involving within the H.P. Lovecraft story of "The Shadow Over Innsmouth".

We would love to hear your feedback down in the comments and our mail: idealessdesigners@gmail.com
